DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this randomised intervention study is to investigate to what degree patients with colorectal cancer benefit of dietary counselling regarding nutritional status, oncologic treatment and quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Can Malnutrition be Prevented in Patient With Colorectal Cancer Stage Dukes D?
